summary: A young woman teams up with a mercenary to find her missing sister in the jungles of New Guinea where they find that a deranged leader of a religious cult has located his commune in an area inhabited by cannibals.
cast: Robert Kerman|Janet Agren|Ivan Rassimov|Mel Ferrer|Paola Senatore|Me Me Lai|Fiamma Maglione|Franco Fantasia|Franco Coduti|Alfred Joseph Berry|Michele Schmiegelm|Gerald Grant|Carlo Longhi|Francesco Narducci|Jake Teague
keywords: exploitation film|mass suicide|new york city new york|papua new guinea|new york cityscape
title: Comidos vivos!
